name: Overrun-Demo
description:
This is the demo version of the upcoming game "Overrun". Overrun will be a top down shooter with metroidvania elements.

You land on an alien infested planet and must search in a research facility for survivors and a way to get home. 

Features:

-explore an alien infested facility and planet

-find 9 new skills to unlock new path and to upgrade your combat power

-change the look of the game via unlockable colour palletes

 -and many more to come!

Disclaimer:

A lot in this demo is subject to change and not final. It is not a part of the final game but rather a compressed version to showcase the abilities and core gameplay.

Feedback is very appreciated! :)
